ProjectTitle: Thermochemical engineering for enhanced control and recovery of valuable inorganic compounds in high-temperature reactors for unrecyclable wasted materials in the Circular Economy
InitialFeedbackHistory:
16/02/2023
Data: Please also list your physical data (samples), and describe the 3rd party agreements with the providers of the materials that you indicate in the data sharing section. 
Sharing: Your section on sharing is not very clear, you indicate that you will deposit your data in RDR where you can share data open or under restricted acces and gives a DIO, but you indicate that no PID is added. You also mention that only members of the research group can acces data which is also not in line with the use of RDR, please clarify this, for more information: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing and https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr

27/01/2023
You have submitted the data management information that is asked for in the proposal. At this stage of the research BOF asks a more elaborate data management plan. To write this you can use https://dmponline.be, where you can also find guidance. For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp
label: good with suggestions
